com.hush.core.security.applet
Class JSException

java.lang.Object
  com.hush.core.security.applet.JSException

public class JSException
extends java.lang.Object

JSException is used report Java exceptions to Javascript clients. Since Javascript cannot handle exceptions this class logs the exception and provides static methods to check for the last error.

Constructor Summary
JSException(java.lang.Throwable throwable)
          Stores the exception message and sets the state of the last error condition.
 
Method Summary
static boolean getLastError()
          Indicates if a new exception has been thrown since the previous error (previous getLastError or resetLastError or getLastError msg call).
static java.lang.String getLastErrorMsg()
          Gets the error message associated with the previous exception.
static void resetLastError()
          Removes last error information.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

public JSException(java.lang.Throwable throwable)
Stores the exception message and sets the state of the last error condition.

Method Detail

resetLastError

public static void resetLastError()
Removes last error information.

getLastError

public static boolean getLastError()
Indicates if a new exception has been thrown since the previous error (previous getLastError or resetLastError or getLastError msg call).

Returns:
true if exception has occured, false otherwise.

getLastErrorMsg

public static java.lang.String getLastErrorMsg()
Gets the error message associated with the previous exception.

Returns:
last exception message.
